text:
@Mike_Pence Your criminal regime has stood by the deaths of 140,000 Americans and growing, while totally bungling the handling of this COVID-19 pandemic. And you lie about what a great job you're doing while 1000s are taking their last breaths.
F^ck you and your beloved dear leader tRump.
